title: Drawing works in simulator but not on physical iOS devices[BUG]
body:
I've run into a strange issue where I'm using an SKCanvasView to collect some simple drawing. This works fine in the simulator, but when launching on physical iOS devices the TouchAction event handler is never hit. It works fine on Android. 

This appears to be the same as issue [341](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/341) but that one the person who ran into it reformatted their mac and setup a whole new build environment and then it was fine. To try to replicate that, I setup everything on a separate machine but it must be tied to these specific versions or my project or something because the same result happened on a separate dev machine. 

Thanks in advance for any assistance! 

Here's the relevant code: 

```

<ContentPage.Content> 
        <RelativeLayout VerticalOptions="FillAndExpand" HorizontalOptions="FillAndExpand">
              <Image x:Name="imgBG"
                      Aspect="AspectFit"
            RelativeLayout.WidthConstraint= "{ConstraintExpression Type=RelativeToParent, Property=Width}"
            RelativeLayout.HeightConstraint= "{ConstraintExpression Type=RelativeToParent, Property=Height}"></Image>
             <StackLayout VerticalOptions="FillAndExpand" HorizontalOptions="FillAndExpand"  RelativeLayout.WidthConstraint=
         "{ConstraintExpression Type=RelativeToParent,
                                Property=Width,
                                Factor=1}"
     RelativeLayout.HeightConstraint=
         "{ConstraintExpression Type=RelativeToParent,
                                Property=Height,
                                Factor=1}" BackgroundColor="Transparent">
            <Grid VerticalOptions="FillAndExpand" HorizontalOptions="FillAndExpand" BackgroundColor="Transparent">
               <skia:SKCanvasView x:Name="canvasView" BackgroundColor="Transparent" PaintSurface="OnCanvasViewPaintSurface" VerticalOptions="FillAndExpand" HorizontalOptions="FillAndExpand" />
                <Grid.Effects>
                 <tt1:TouchEffect Capture="True"
                                        TouchAction="OnTouchEffectAction" />
            </Grid.Effects>
                </Grid>

            <Grid HorizontalOptions="CenterAndExpand" Padding="20">
             <Button x:Name="btnClear" Text="Clear" Clicked="btnClear_ClickedAsync" Grid.Column="0" BackgroundColor="{DynamicResource btnMutedBG}" TextColor="{DynamicResource btnMutedText}"></Button>   
             <Button x:Name="btnCancel" Text="Cancel" Clicked="btnCancel_ClickedAsync" Grid.Column="1" BackgroundColor="{DynamicResource btnMutedBG}" TextColor="{DynamicResource btnMutedText}"></Button>
             <Button x:Name="btnDone" Text="Done" Clicked="btnDone_ClickedAsync" Grid.Column="2" BackgroundColor="{DynamicResource btnPrimaryBG}" TextColor="{DynamicResource btnPrimaryText}"></Button>   
           </Grid>

            
        </StackLayout>
        </RelativeLayout>
       

    </ContentPage.Content>
```


Issue: OnTouchEffectAction handler is never hit when on physical iPad. 



- Version with issue: SkiaSharp.Views.Forms 1.68.0
- Last known good version: unknown
- IDE:  Visual Studio for Mac 8.3.9 (build 2)
- Platform Target Frameworks: iOS on iPad, tested on 12.4
- Works perfectly in simulator
  - Android: NA
  - iOS:  12.4
- Target Devices:  iPad air 2
